lead_paragraph: Sunderland's 1-1 draw with Southampton at the weekend lifted them out of the bottom three but manager Sam Allardyce sees the result as two points lost instead of a point gained in the battle to avoid the Premier League drop.
snippet: Sunderland's 1-1 draw with Southampton at the weekend lifted them out of the bottom three but manager Sam Allardyce sees the result as two points lost instead of a point gained in the battle to avoid the Premier League drop....
